1122.content: Todd didn't get much sleep since midnight. Tod was tossing and turning because of his new child. When Todd wakes up at 8:00am he quickly notices that he is late for work. As Todd is a Race car driver. Then he quickly gets to the race track not noticing his 9 month pregnant belly. He gets to the hauler for his race car. Grabs his fire suit to find out...
1122.title: 9 month

11223.content: Todd quickly put on his fire suit as if there was no pregnant belly at all. He then go to his car which is the number 98 sponsored by NASCO. He jumps in the car and starts to practice. By the time of the race his belly had grown out about to 4months with one. he climbs into the race to race the 700 mile event. about 100 miles into the event his belly had surged forward to 6 months. He then pits to get new tires. then he says that he might not be able to get out of the car. Crew chief says that is fine once you are done the race providing there is no wrecks the car is street legal.
11223.title: His belly had disappeared

112232.content:
Then at lap 355 of the event, Todd felt his belly surge forward to 12 months with triples. At the end of the race, Todd won and his belly shrunk back into his body. He went to the victory lane and clamed his trophy. Then at his house, he changed out of his race uniform and got into his diving suit. He went down to his private beach and got his undersea gear and got suited up. He then put on the mask and got into the water. He opened the valve and dove underwater.

After 10 minutes underwater, Todd felt his belly starting to surge forward again. He looked down at his belly and saw it grew back to 12 months with triplets.
112232.title: Todd wins the race.

1122321.content:
After 6 months of his pregnancy, he was sent to the hospital to give birth. He wanted to get rid of his babies because they were bothering him a lot and almost lost his job because of his pregnancy. His friend Tess showed up and got into a nurses uniform to help him. She grabbed his hand and rubbed his belly.

“Almost there. There, your first child is born. Now here is the second and the third. Congrats sir, you had female triplets.” The doctor said.

Tess took 2 of the newborns and Todd took the third. They all had different eye colors and all looked the same. The one Todd was actually smaller then the other two and had violet eyes. The one in Tess’s left arm had grassy green eyes and the third had blue eyes.

“They all are beautiful!” Tess said.

“But how am I going to take care of them with my job?” Todd said.

“Well we could give them up for adoption or I could take care of them.”

“Let’s put 2 of them up for adoption and you can keep the third.”

“I’ll take the one with the purple eyes and put the others up.”

Tess left the hospital with the normal 2 infants and took them to the adoption center and went home with the purple eyed one. Tess named her Aimi and she loved it.
1122321.title: 6 months later

13.content: Saras older sister has become pregnant so sara want to be pregnant too. She goes to school and finds a 15 year old boy and asks him to get her pregnant he touches her belly and then she starts to expand into a big pregnant lady. she goes to class 9 months pregnant with
13.title: Sara

choices: She is seen by one of her friends
She is seen by a teacher

131.content: Sarah looks down at her now child-swollen belly. She grins, looking up at the 15 year old boy and says a brief "Thank you!", before rush-erm, "waddling" off to class. Her walk down to class goes without incident, until......
131.title: Octuplets

132.content:
So big. It was all Sara could think as she waddled to class. Her clothes had been stretched to the limit by her belly's expansion. Her pants had handled her recent change fairly well thanks to their elastic waistband. Her shirt though hadn't fared as well as it left the bottom half of her belly exposed, the few stretch marks she had visible to any passerby. She had taken a small detour to the bathroom as she was unused to the pressure her belly exerted on her bladder. It was as she finished that her twins began moving for the first time.

It's so different than when Sis let me feel her belly. Looking down at her big belly Sara saw all the little bumps her babies were making. My babies, Sara loved the thought of it as she began rubbing her belly taking in the feel of her stretched skin. Amazed at how she was able to be so big, so full of life like her older sister Jenny. She couldn't wait till she got home so that she could compare her bump to her sister's. I bet my belly is bigger than hers, Shaking out of her daydream Sara realized she had reached her classroom.

Taking a deep breath, she was about to enter when the bell rang. Time ...
132.title: Twins

1321.content:
For everyone to go to recess. She waddled out to the play ground and her friends surrounded her. They felt her belly and felt her twins kicking. Then Sara’s water broke. She leaned up against a wall and sat down. Sara started to breathe heavily and scream. Then one of the teachers came and picked Sara up and carried her to the nurses’ room. The nurse came in and the teacher left. The nurse was also pregnant with twins and she told Sara that paramedics are on there way. When they arrived, they took Sara to the hospital. Soon after Sara arrived to her room in the pregnancy ward, her mother arrived.

“Don’t worry sweaty. You are in labor and going to give birth to your twins.” Her mother said while holding her daughters hand and rubbing her belly.

After 3 hours of labor, Sara gave birth to her twins. The twins were…

13212.content:
A male and a female. Sara was happy to have a female so she has a girl to play with. They went home and Sara went to bed with her children. When she woke up the next morning, she was 10 years older. Now that she is 17 and her 10 year old twins. Then she realized that she and her son were naked and her son was having sex with her while she was asleep.

“Jarrod, what are you doing!” Sara shouted.

“I am having sex with you mommy.” Jarrod said.

“Well, you can’t do that to me.”

“Why cant me mommy?”

“Because I am your mother and you can’t do that and you can only have sex with your sister.”

Then Sara got up and got dressed and undressed her daughter. Jarrod started to have sex with his twin sister, Jennifer. Sara went down stairs and had breakfast and went to her new job. Sara’s job was a…

154.content: 14 year old Jessica was 2 months pregnant with…
154.title: Jessica

choices: Her belly grows a little bit at the contact
1542.content: Jessica let out a little huff as she tried to close her jeans but they just wouldn't shut. "Oh come on!" she finally said before turning sideways to look at herself in the mirror. She poked the small outward curve of her middle with one of her fingers. "I guess I really do have to go on that diet..." She mumbled before sighing and grabbing a pair of old sweatpants to put on instead. It wasn't like she was going anywhere anyway. She liked spending time at home on Saturdays. She walked over to the little gold idol of a pregnant woman sitting on her desk, sent to her by her mother from her archaeology site in Peru. "I might end up looking like you." She giggled as she poked the little gem that stood out in place of a belly button.
1542.title: Jessica's Belly

choices: Get some sleep. It's been a long month (She dreams with the pregnancy)
Her stomach is growling. She could get a snack.
15422.content:
"How is even posible?" Jessica saud out loud in her room, when she looked herself in the mirror.
"I've been eating anything but fruits and vegetables and I'm still gaining more pounds." She was, frustated in the best of the cases.
Her little buldge not only didn't reduce but got bigger to the point of being a bump. To this point something wasn't right with her.

She wasn't understanding she follow her diet letter by letter.
She didn't eat any sweets nor midnight snack that could make her gain weight, even though she swore her belly almost growled everytume she resist the tentation.
"Maybe I should get an advice for someone or somthing, I don't know." she expresed with a tired tone. She didn't know why, but since she started the diet she started to feel not only more hungry but also tired and sick all the day.
And in the night, she started to get dreams that for some odd reason she couldn't remember, and only getting woke up by a sudden hot burning feeling in her belly area.
"My stomach hurts." she looked in the clock to find that it was 8 o'clock of the night.
She could see what she could do next in the morning so she could...
15422.title: [One month later]

1543.content: The fertility statue had put twelve babies in her belly, Fortunately the statue had given her the broad hips needed to carry that many children and had strengthen her body and uterus so she could safely carry that many to full term. already with only two months in she was pretty big with twelve in her belly, but Jessica was oddly happy, she had never felt so womanly, so full of life. She would have to go back to that statue again some day. The fruits of her womb would be legion.
1543.title: dodecaleps

15432.content: Jessica was only satisfied for those two months. She wanted a lot more babies than the dozen she had. She went back to the fertility statue in hopes of having more babies put in her. Once back at the statue she rested her palms and belly on it for a good while. That was enough to bring her to dumillioctingentoctogentiplets. She wasn't expecting jumping 240 times her numbers from twelve to two thousand eight hundred eighty but she was overly happy none the less. She waited at home three more months during which she really grew a lot.
15432.title: 12 is not enough

155.content:
Thirteen year old Alice and her eleven year old sister Becky lives on a farm where they breed animals but numbers just aren't up enough so her family decides to use an old family trick to bring up production. Inserting animal embryos into the young girls' womb for them to grow. (One or both)

Twelve year old Jessie goes to a school that trains girls to be surrogates but getting them pregnant through IVF and having them be graded on how well their pregnancies turn out. She's just starting the new semester.
155.title: What about this set?

15511.content: Alright then. What will Alice be carrying around in her belly?
15511.title: Alice (13)

155111.content:
Alice huffs as she gets out of bed. To any outside observer, the child looks as if she were carrying around full term twin babies in her belly. In truth, she was pregnant with puppies. And not just one litter, oh no, she was carrying around two litters that each had 7 puppies. The size of her belly was too much for her tiny 13 year old body.

Alice plants her feet on the ground and slowly gets up. She groans when she realizes that her belly dropped overnight and the puppies inside were squirming around. She taps her large bump.

"Hey stop that!" The movements stop, then start up again. She sighs and changes out of her nightgown into an oversized t-shirt and shorts. The kicks of the pups could be seen through her shirt. She waddles out of her room and with her hands on her back, she heads downstairs. It feels as if there was a bowling ball between her legs. As Alice's belly had dropped, the pups laid deep in her pelvis.

When she gets downstairs, after stopping to catch her breath, she notices her parents at the dining room table. "Mom? Dad?" They look over at her.

"Honey... Your father and I were talking, we need the more animals on the farm. So, we were thinking, you can be out of school forever and be our breeder or go back to school after the puppies are born."
155111.title: Puppies

choices: Becky talks about how she's going to get pregnant now too!
Becky asks if she can feel Alice's belly again.
1551121.content: Alice let out a huff as she rolled out of bed and hefted herself to her feet. Eleven months. She was going to have to carry a foal inside her womb for eleven whole months. She rubbed her belly that already looked about to pop with twins and let out a sigh. "Only five more to go." She reminded herself before starting to waddle out of her room, horse pressing heavy into her pelvis on her bladder. She propped a hand into the small of her back and gasped when she bumped into Becky.
1551121.title: A horse?

15511212.content:
"Hi Alice!" Becky gasped and her hand hovered above her sister's bump.

"Can I feel? Please?" Becky looks at Alice with a pout.

Alice sighs and pulls her shirt up. "Sure."

Becky's hands touch the tight skin of Alice's tummy. She rubs her palms over the swell. "How's Mommy feeling today?"

Alice sighs again. "Mommy's feeling the need to pee. So get out of my way before I pee all over myself." She takes her sister's hands off her massive bump and waddles to the bathroom.

Before she gets there she...
15511212.title: Becky asks if she can feel Alice's belly ag...

choices: tiny shorts that don't close around her bump
155112121.content:
Alice gasps as the foal presses even harder. With a grunt, her pants and underwear become soaked with piss.

"Oh no!" With that, the foal kicks her, the outline of the hooves showing through the tight skin of her belly.

"Dang it! Now I have to go change." She turns directions and waddles back to her room.

She looks through her closet and finds...
155112121.title: pees herself

15512.content: Okay. what will Becky be carrying around in that belly of hers?
15512.title: Becky (11)

155121.content: Becky giggled a little as she ran her hands over her round belly and felt the litter of puppies squirming around inside her. Papa had said she was having eight of them and she couldn't wait until they showed up. Sometimes she was upset that her big sister hadn't wanted to pitch in and help with the breeding numbers but she was always glad she had made that choice. It was only a twelve week ordeal and then they would all be out of her tummy. At eight weeks in she already looked like she was ready to pop a baby out and her puppies were getting pretty heavy. Mama had gotten her some nice big clothes that bit around her belly but she still spent most of her time in shorts that she couldn't button up anymore and shirts that only covered her chest. She liked being able to see her big belly popping out of her clothes, making her too big for them. She'd even started having to wear bras because she was getting little milk filled breasts. She swung her legs out of bed and waddled out of her room only to bump into-
155121.title: Puppies

15513.content: Alright then! Do these girlies have the same thing in their bellies or different things?
15513.title: Both!

155131.content: Okay. Let's look into some options here. Rabbits? 30 day gestation period on that. Growing quick and often
155131.title: Same

choices: He wants to induce your birth today!
He  wants to start selling our milk!
He wants us to stop schooling and be permanent breeders in the barn.
1551322.content:
Alice ran one hand over her round belly as she waddled her way down the hall from her bedroom. At 12 weeks pregnant she was on the verge of giving birth any minute now, belly full of squirming kittens. And it certainly was very full. She looked as though she was overdue to give birth to a human child, the weight of a pregnancy feeling heavy on her 13-year-old frame. She wouldn't normally have been this large but she was carrying a triple litter for her father since the kittens were small at birth and they really needed to have a lot bred. Thankfully she and Becky were homeschooled so they didn't have to deal with questions of why their bellies had swelled so quickly.

Alice waddled to the barn where she found Becky in her usual spot, watching the father of her own pregnancy. Becky was more heavily pregnancy than her elder sister, having been more eager to be mother to animals. She had pushed past being slightly overdue into certainly overdue, her many piglets nestled in her young womb giving the child a motherly shape when combined with the milk-heavy breasts both girls now sported. The girl was rubbing her stomach as she watched the large hog laid in a pen. "You spend all your time watching him. It's like you think he's your boyfriend." Alice teased, drawing her sister's attention. Becky smiled a little.

"It let's me think about what my babies are going to grow up into. Nice fat piggies." Becky shot back, pushing off where she had been leaned back on a wall. Alice's eyes went to her sister's piglet-filled stomach. It was hard to believe she was so large and yet still had another three weeks left of her 15 week pregnancy. "Oh! Did you hear Daddy's plan?" Becky asked excitedly.
1551322.title: Alice (kittens) & Becky (pigs)

15513221.content:
"Daddy wants to induce your labor!" Becky says. "He thinks you're ready to give birth."

Alice nods, though she's terrified. She has to give birth already? Alice gulps as she hears footsteps outside. There's a knock at the door.

"Girls? You in here?" It was Alice's and Becky's father. He comes inside. Alice notices he has a syringe with some liquid inside in his hand. "I trust Becky told you what's happening today?" Alice nods. "Good. All I'm going to do is stick this in your back to start labor." He walks over to her and lifts her shirt up. He sticks the needle in and disposes the liquid. "You best get on back to your room Alice. It's going to be a long hard labor."

"Okay Daddy." Alice waddles out of the barn and back to her room where she plops down on the bed, her tiny body sinking in the mattress. She groans and grabs her belly as it tightens.

"It's not supposed to be happening this quick is it?" Alice pulls off her shorts and underwear but leaves her shirt on. She reaches over and puts a few fingers up her vagina to see how dilated she was.

"I'm five cm dilated." She removes her fingers. "I should go to sleep." With that she goes under the covers.

A few hours later, Alice wakes up with her back on fire. She squirms around as she feels wetness between her legs. "I should tell Daddy the kittens are ready to be born." She changes out of her shirt and goes for a fitting tank top; she also puts her underwear and shorts back on after she cleaned herself up. She waddles to where Daddy is sitting with Becky, his hand rubbing it.

"Daddy? The kittens are ready to be born." Her father removes his hand.

"Where do you want to give birth sweet pea? In your room or the tub?"
15513221.title: He wants to induce your birth today!

1553.content:
Ten-year-old David was visiting his big brother at college, and got dared to drink a strange chemical in the science lab. Oops! Now he's suddenly not feeling so well....


Sam is twenty and a freshman in college. His girlfriend hates that he sleeps around so much, so she decided to do something about it. She never told him her family line has the ability to do magic.....
1553.title: More choices

choices: Go to the Campus Health Services building
15531.content:
For a moment nothing happened as David set the now-empty beaker back on the counter he got it from. But suddenly, his stomach rumbled and shook inside of him. A wriggling sensation began, one that made him feel queasy.

"Wh-what's happening to me?!," he stammered in a panic, stifling a sick-sounding burp. His stomach rolled and began to swell, puffing up like a balloon until it poked out from under his shirt. He needed to get some help, but whom should he go to?
15531.title: David

choices: Give me some more choices, please.

As an alternative though, there is Sarah Collins. Sarah is twenty five years old and is the owner of a small bookstore in a large city. Already very curvy, she will likely end up even more so due to a supposedly magical book she comes into contact with.

You can also continue on and see if any further characters will suit you better.
15532.title: A fork in the road
